cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause security configuration parsing errors, leading to failure in establishing secure connections for data radio bearers.

du.explanation_en: Setting rfsimulator.modelname to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the RF simulator to fail initialization, preventing proper signal simulation and potentially causing the DU to malfunction.
du.explanation_zh: 將 rfsimulator.modelname 設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致 RF 模擬器初始化失敗，阻止正確的信號模擬，並可能導致 DU 故障。
